p: (2) DPPH Radical Scavenging Activity. The results presented in Figure 1(b) show the activity of Combretin A and B in free radical scavenging by the DPPH test. It appears that Combretin A and B and vitamin C at the concentration of 1â€‰mg/mL showed a significant activity ( p < 0.001) with inhibition percentages, respectively, of 91.38%, 57.83%, and 95.15%.
